actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER
  SET   CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_NUMBER = {{vayIndNcRegNo.text}},
        CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_IECNO = {{Input1.text}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_DATE = {{moment(vayIndNcRegDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_COMM_DATE = {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_PLACE = {{vayIndNcRegPlace.text}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID = {{Input2.text}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_NATURE   = {{vayIndNcBusinessNature.selectedOptionValue}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_WEBSITE = {{Input3.text}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_NATURE_ACTIVITY = {{vayIndNcNatureActivity.text}}
WHERE OID = {{ appsmith.store.customerOID }};
